snippet: Vermont Yankee brought high-paying jobs and an expanded tax base to an area with precious little industry. But it drew decades of protest from residents who feared a nuclear disaster.
abstract: Reactions of residents of Vernon, Vt, to closing of nearby Vermont Yankee nuclear plant are mixed; some hail it as successful culmination of decades of protest and others view it as end of era of prosperity created by the plant; Entergy, which owns the plant, ultimately decided to close it down due to economic concerns.
lead_paragraph: Vermont Yankee brought high-paying jobs and an expanded tax base to an area with precious little industry. But it drew decades of protest from residents who feared a nuclear disaster.

headline.main: Vermont Yankee Nuclear Plant Begins Slow Process of Closing
headline.print_headline: Vermont Yankee Begins Slow Process of Closing
